title: Presentation Spoon, ""Coronation"", 1901
markings: On shaft stamped: Liberty + Co., Birmingham 1901/ CYMRIC"; "Ro391478"
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program and Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Funds in honor of David Revere McFadden
description: Flat, circular bowl with engraved book-ended celtic pattern across top. Center of bowl divides plain of green and blue enamel. Shaft joins above bowl with celtic engraving and blue and green enamel rectangle continuing halfway along shaft with winged knot flanges. Shaft continues to point with additional celtic ornament flanking the end.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Presentation Spoon, ""Coronation"", 1901.
1901. Silver, enamel. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program and Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Funds in honor of David Revere McFadden. 1996-17-1.
